q: host David Letterman underwent emergency heart surgery in 2000 and chatted candidly with Barbara Walters about his feelings of joy following the operation. But they didn't last long. Fiat is a great multinational which is growing in the world but its heart remains Italian, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said Saturday, adding,`` All arguments are now closed.
